name: Blistering Heatwave
ability: Deploy: Banish a unit or artifact.
quote: Just when you think it can't get any hotter...

name: Giant Turtle
ability: Deploy: Add an additional mana die to the pot.
Expire: Remove a mana die from the pot.
quote: Could this be a dog?

name: Bounty Hunter
quote: You can run, but you can't hide.

name: Pact
quote: For sale, world. Price: your soul.

name: Elemental Priestess
ability: Deploy: Convert all mana of one color into another color of your choice.
quote: All magic comes from one source, and to its source must return.

name: Assassin
quote: Humans make good assassins. I hear they also make good targets..

name: Butler
quote: Anything you require, sir.

name: Emissary
ability: Deploy: Play a unit from hand, then draw a card.
quote: Introducing his most gracious excellency...

name: Fireball
ability: Deploy: Conjure 1 fire mana and Assault 2.
quote: I didn't ask how big the room was. I said I cast fireball.

name: Chaos Slave
ability: Activate: Tutor a common chaos unit, then destroy self.
quote: A man cannot serve two masters.

name: Chaos Vanguard
quote: Kill, steal, destroy!

name: Saboteur
ability: Deploy: Expend X mana dice of the same color, then Rally X.
quote: This is the war of the future.

name: Chaos Soldier
quote: The enemy never knows what we're going to do in advance, and neither do we.

name: Chaos Grenadier
ability: Deploy: Reroll one of your opponent's mana dice.
quote: The smell of gunpowder is sweet.

name: Chaos Cavalry
quote: Ride or die? Why not both?

name: Chaos Knight
quote: To fight for honor is insanity. Therefore, I fight for insanity itself.

name: Chaos Mage
quote: Chaos is power!

name: Chaos Infiltrator
quote: Escape plan? You lost me at "plan".

name: Chaos Dutchess
quote: Men are so predictable.

name: Inspector Culso
ability: Deploy, Chaos X: Look at all cards from your opponent's hand with a provision cost of X or less and play one.
Finally: Your opponent draws a card.
quote: With me, surprises are rarely unexpected.

name: Chaos Manor
ability: Deploy: Tutor a Chaos Slave or Chaos Dutchess.
Passive: Adjacent Chaos Slaves and Dutchesses do not destroy themselves.
quote: If home is where the heart is, then they're homeless.

name: Nameless God of Sorrow
quote: Weep not for what has been, but for what will be.

name: Lord Kilgrom
ability: Deploy: Move a mana die from your opponent's pool to the pot.
quote: All those deaths, just to move some lines on a map.

name: Quartermaster Ionos
quote: He always finds the perfect man for the job.

name: Lady Lima
ability: Deploy, Chaos X: Tutor a unit with X or fewer provisions.
quote: Fortunately, I've already accounted for your incompetence.

name: Pandemonium
ability: Chaos 4: Choose three cards from your deck, then play one at random.
Chaos 5: Choose two cards from your deck, then play one at random.
Chaos 6: Tutor a card from your deck.
Finally: Return any unplayed cards to your deck.
quote: Pandemonium did not reign; it poured.

name: Yalmamir, Prince of Chaos
ability: Deploy: Seize a unit with power less than or equal to self.
quote: A single incompetent enemy is worth a thousand incompetent friends.

name: Kali, High Priestess
ability: Activate: Reroll all common and allied mana dice.
Passive: Whenever a mana die is rerolled during your turn, Rally.
quote: I love it when they struggle.

name: Artizyrxys, Chaos Dragon
ability: Activate: Reroll any 2 allied mana dice.
quote: Fear is for mortals.

name: Grand Inquisitor Molgrippe
ability: Deploy, Chaos 5: Destroy an enemy unit or artifact.
quote: The anomaly will be corrected momentarily.

name: Bledgoath, God of Insanity
ability: Deploy, Chaos X: Seize up to 3 enemy units with a combined power of X or less.
quote: More for me!

name: Eris, Goddess of Discord
ability: Deploy: Tutor a bronze Chaos unit.
Activate, Chaos 5: Resurrect a bronze Chaos unit.
quote: When the new age dawns, there will be no turning back.

name: Fireswill Wine
ability: Equip: Rally 4 and conjure 2 fire mana.
quote: The cheapest booze that money can buy.

name: Dwarven Miner
ability: Activate: Rally 1 and conjure 1 fire mana.
quote: Screw whistling--we drink while we work!

name: Forgetender
quote: Work them bellows, boy, till they're hotter than hot!

name: Flame Gecko
ability: Deploy: Expend 2 fire mana, then Assault 2.
quote: They're quite harmless in small numbers. Specifically when the number is zero.

name: Golden Froth
quote: Beer is proof that God loves dwarves and wants them to be happy.

name: Dwarven Brawler
ability: Imbibe: Expend 1 fire mana, then Assault 2.
quote: If its a fight yer lookin' fer, ye just found it.

name: Dragon Egg
quote: Probably best not to touch them.

name: Pit Wyvern
ability: Activate: Expend 3 fire mana, then Assault 3.
quote: Soft as barbed wire and charming as a gut punch.

name: Dragonbrew Reserve
ability: Equip: Rally 3 and conjure 1 fire mana.
quote: The good stuff.

name: Royal Wyvern
ability: Deploy: Expend X fire mana, then Rally X.
quote: Capable of turning a dwarf into barbecue in 3 seconds flat.

name: Swoop
ability: Expend 1 air mana, then Tutor a common dragon.
quote: By the time you see them, it's too late.

name: Stumpy's Axe
ability: If equipped to a target that has a liquor card equipped, Assault 5 instead.
If equipped to Stumpy McGee, Assassinate 5 instead.
quote: The one, the only.

name: Forgemaster
quote: To master tha' forge, ya gotta become one with 'er. Jus' kiddin, tha' would be weird.

name: Lost Dragon Egg
ability: This card starts in your graveyard.
quote: It's a long way back to the nest.

name: Dragonseeker
ability: Deploy, Expend 2 fire mana: Tutor a dragon egg.
Deploy, Expend 3 fire mana: Resurrect a dragon egg.
quote: You're safe now, little feller.

name: Secret Brew
ability: Equip: Rally 10 and trigger imbibe an additional time.
quote: What'd you even put in this stuff?

name: Stumpy McGee
quote: Well, somebody woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

name: Golden Dragon Egg
ability: Deploy, Expend 3 fire mana: gain Haste.
Activate: Tutor a dragon, then banish self.
quote: Oooh, shiny!

name: Goryx, Golden Dragon
ability: Activate, Expend X fire mana: Tutor a card of 2X provisions.
quote: The reason I act like I'm better than you is because I am.

name: Guardian Dragon
ability: Passive: Summon self from deck when an allied dragon egg is destroyed.
quote: Ohhh now you've made 'er mad!

name: Neromir, Warrior Dragon
ability: Activate: Expend X fire mana, then Assault X.
quote: Dragons are destruction in its purest and most beautiful form.

name: Ancestral Ale
ability: Equip: Rally 8 and Conjure 3 fire mana.
quote: The old good stuff.

name: Dragonmother Erizyx
ability: Deploy: Protect all unprotected allied dragon eggs.
Passive: Whenever you play a dragon egg, protect it.
Finale: Rally 2 for each allied dragon egg.
quote: She's a lady and you will treat her as such.

name: Sven Forkbarb, Mountain King
ability: Deploy: Play all copies of a liquor card from deck.
quote: He doesn't believe in discussing matters of state while sober.

name: Drinking Contest
ability: Deploy: Play a dwarf, then Tutor a common liquor card
Deploy: Tutor a common dwarf, then Play a liquor card.
quote: When its a drinking contest, everybody wins. -- Dwarven proverb

name: Pixie
ability: Deploy: Conjure earth mana water mana air mana.
quote: So tiny, yet so beautiful.

name: Dryad Archer
quote: They always fire a warning shot.

name: Fairy Ring
ability: Activate, Expend earth mana: Deactivate an enemy unit.
Inactive, Turnwise: Conjure 1 earth mana, water mana, or air mana.
quote: Come dance with us!

name: Forest Fire
ability: Destroy an allied unit of X power, then rally X and conjure X earth mana, air mana, or water mana.
quote: Flames clear the way for new growth.

name: Tadpole
ability: Activate, Expend 3 water mana: Tutor Bullfrog Army, then destroy self.
Turnwise: decrease the activation mana cost by 1.
quote: They grow up so fast.

name: Bullfrog Army
ability: Deploy, Expend earth mana water mana: Assault 2.
quote: Survivors describe their attacks as a ribbeting experience.

name: Warthog
ability: Deploy, Expend X earth mana: Rally X. Expire: Rout 4.
quote: Get outta the way!

name: Pond Naiad
quote: Beautiful. Serene. Deadly.

name: Lightning Strike
ability: Expend X air mana: Increase the Assault by X.
quote: You've been thunderstruck.

name: Lifegiving Rainfall
ability: Held, Expend 3 water mana: Play this card, then draw a card.
quote: The rain begins with a single drop.

name: Dryad Warrior
ability: Deploy, Expend earth mana water mana air mana: Assault 3.
quote: Every life matters. So does every death.

name: Treant Sage
quote: I think, therefore... hmmm...

name: Flash Flood
ability: Expend X water mana: Assassinate X.
quote: Six feet high and rising

name: Bamboo Grove
ability: Turnwise, Expend water mana earth mana: Rally 3.
quote: Nothing grows faster, or thicker.

name: Thunderstorm
ability: Conjure water mana air mana, then Tutor a nature card.
quote: She's a-gonna blow!

name: Puck
ability: Deploy: Tutor a unit whose provision cost exceeds Puck's.
quote: Give me your hands, if we be friends.

name: Jack Frost
ability: Finale: Rally 2 for every nature card in your graveyard.
quote: Whose woods these are, I think I know...

name: Lady of the Lake
ability: Finale, X water mana: Rally X.
quote: Soggy bints handin' out swords is no basis for a system of government.

name: Titania
ability: Deploy: Summon a Pixie on either side of this unit, from graveyard or deck as necessary.
Activate: Conjure 2 earth mana, 2 air mana, or 2 water mana.
quote: Hand in hand, with fairy grace, we will sing and bless this place.

name: King Oberon
ability: Activate: Tutor or Resurrect a Lightning Strike.
quote: Ill met by moonlight, proud Titania.

name: Great Oak
ability: Deploy, expend X earth mana: Assault X.
quote: I-is that tree... moving?

name: Allmother
ability: Deploy, Expend earth mana water mana air mana: Tutor a Peace unit.
Deploy, Expend 3 earth mana: Resurrect a Peace unit.
quote: No wound too deep, no bone too broken, no heart beyond repair.

name: Restraining Order
ability: Deploy: Conjure 3 dark mana and Deactivate a unit.
quote: Stop right there!

name: Avalonian Herald
quote: I've got some good news and some bad news...

name: Forbear of Avalon
ability: Deploy: Conjure light mana or dark mana.
quote: We learn who came before us so that we may guide those who come after us.

name: Avalonian Crusader
ability: Activate, Expend X light mana: Rally X
Activate, Expend X dark mana: Assault X.
quote: Deus vult!

name: Indictment
ability: Deploy: Expend light mana dark mana, then Assassinate 3
quote: You have the right to face your accuser in a court of law.

name: Ultimatum
quote: It's not a threat. It's a promise.

name: Affidavit
quote: The truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth.

name: Warrior Monk
quote: To master the body, one must first master the mind.

name: Sub Poena
ability: Deploy: Expend 2 dark mana, then Seize 2
quote: See you in court.

name: Valkyrie
ability: Deploy: Conjure light mana dark mana.
Activate: Play a common warrior from your graveyard.

name: Judge
ability: Passive: Whenever you play a law, Rally.
quote: Judge not, lest ye be judged.

name: Imperial Paladin
ability: Deploy: Conjure light mana dark mana.
quote: Death before dishonor.

name: Seneschal
ability: Deploy, Expend 2 light mana: gain Haste.
Activate: Tutor a common Justice unit.
quote: All in good order, I trust.

name: Attorney
ability: Deploy, Expend light mana dark mana: Tutor a common law.
quote: A good lawyer knows the case. A great lawyer knows the judge.

name: Gabriel
ability: Passive: Whenever you Tutor a card, Rally 2.
quote: I am Gabriel, who stands in the presence of God!

name: Methuselah, Ancestor
ability: Deploy, Expend 3 light mana: Do not destroy self.
quote: They say 500 is the new 400...

name: Odin, Allfather
ability: Deploy: Look through your deck and move any card to the bottom.
Activate: Look through your deck and move any card to the top.
Finale: You need not shuffle your deck this round.
quote: There's only one 'i' in wisdom.

name: Heimdall
ability: Deploy, Expend light mana dark mana: Swap a unit in your deck with a unit in your graveyard.

name: High Priest Melchizedek
ability: Turnwise, X light mana, Y dark mana: Rally X, Rout Y
quote: Ask not what God can do for you, but what you can do for God.

name: Enoch, Prophet
ability: Activate: Rally according to the provision cost of the next card you Tutor.
quote: You know the baby's gonna be a prophet when his first word is "Lo!"

name: Ariel, Heaven's Lioness
quote: She makes cute noises when she fights. Adorable.

name: Mjolnir
ability: Equip: Rally 8. If equipped to Thor, Assault 8 instead.
quote: Who is worthy to wield the hammer of Thor?

name: Jurisprudence
ability: Deploy: Conjure 2 light mana and Tutor a common Justice unit.
Deploy, Expend 2 light mana: Tutor a Justice unit.
quote: Law is order, and good law is good order.

name: Thor, Son of Odin
ability: Deploy: Banish a card from your graveyard, then Assault a unit by its power.

name: Stephen, Martyr
ability: Deploy: Play a card from hand.
Deploy, Expend 2 light mana: Play a unit from hand and Protect it.
quote: Do not hold this sin against them!

name: Judgment Day
ability: Passive: Whenever you play a unit, Conjure light mana. Whenever your opponent plays a unit, Conjure dark mana.
Activate, Expend 5 light mana: Resurrect a unit.
Activate, Expend 5 dark mana: Destroy a unit.
quote: Pride goeth before a fall...

name: Asgard
ability: Deploy, 3 dark mana: Move a Justice unit from your graveyard to your deck.
Activate, 3 light mana: Play a Justice unit from your deck.
quote: No brave deed goes unrecorded in the halls of Asgard.

name: Archangel Michael
quote: Behold, the commander of the armies of heaven.

name: Azrael, Angel of Death
ability: Overkill X: Conjure X dark mana.
quote: The preservation of life requires the destruction of evil.

name: New Jerusalem
ability: Activate: Rally by the combined provision cost of adjacent units.
quote: Truth and Justice prevail in the end.
